get.description: You can check whether an IBAN is valid, that is its country code, structure, length, and checksum are valid. It also checks that the bank ID exists and that it is allowed for use in the IBANs. If the bank ID is not allowed, then it is listed in the Exclusion List. This list contains bank IDs that must not be used in IBANs. This validity call allows for very fast, low overhead checking of the validity of an IBAN.

parameters.name: iban
parameters.description: IBAN to validate

400.description: Wrong URL format or Invalid request

401.description: You do not have sufficient privileges to execute this service

404.description: ISO IBAN country code prefix is not valid or IBAN length is invalid or IBAN checksum is invalid or Bank ID is not known to SWIFT or The bank ID is invalid according to the EXCLUSION LIST or Wrong URL format

get.summary: Get the BIC for an IBAN
get.description: For a given IBAN, you can retrieve the BIC of the institution that services the IBAN. This API is compliant with the requirement for BIC from IBAN derivation defined in the Regulation (EU) No 260/2012.

parameters.name: iban
parameters.description: IBAN for which the corresponding BIC is requested

400.description: Wrong URL format or Invalid request

401.description: You do not have sufficient privileges to execute this service

404.description: No corresponding BIC found or Wrong URL format

get.description: For a given IBAN, you can obtain the components of the IBAN.

parameters.name: iban
parameters.description: IBAN for which details are requested

400.description: Wrong URL format or Invalid request

401.description: You do not have sufficient privileges to execute this service

404.description: No corresponding IBAN found or Wrong URL format

get.summary: Get the IBAN from a BBAN
get.description: For a given Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN), you can retrieve the corresponding IBAN; you must also provide a country code

parameters.name: bban
parameters.description: BBAN for which the corresponding IBAN is requested

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The 2-character ISO 3166-1 country code of the country that issued the national ID

400.description: Invalid country code parameter or Invalid parameters or Wrong URL format or Invalid request

401.description: You do not have sufficient privileges to execute this service

404.description: No corresponding IBAN found or Wrong URL format

get.description: For a given BIC, you can retrieve the details of that BIC, that is the bank name or business name, and the address.

parameters.name: bic
parameters.description: BIC (8-characters or 11-characters) for which details are requested

400.description: Wrong URL format or Invalid request

401.description: You do not have sufficient privileges to execute this service

404.description: No corresponding BIC found or Wrong URL format

get.description: You can check whether a BIC is correct and valid, that is whether it is published in the BIC Directory; optionally, you can check whether a BIC was valid at a particular date in the past

parameters.name: bic
parameters.description: BIC (8-characters or 11-characters) to validate

parameters.name: effective_date
parameters.description: A date in YYYY-MM-DD format

400.description: Invalid BIC format or BIC not supplied or Invalid date parameter or Wrong URL format or Invalid request

401.description: You do not have sufficient privileges to execute this service

404.description: Invalid BIC or BIC not found or Wrong URL format

get.summary: Get the LEI for a BIC
get.description: For a given BIC, you can retrieve the LEI of that BIC.

parameters.name: bic
parameters.description: BIC (8-characters or 11-characters) for which the corresponding LEI is requested

400.description: Wrong URL format or Invalid request

401.description: You do not have sufficient privileges to execute this service

404.description: No corresponding LEI found or Wrong URL format

get.summary: Get the BIC for an LEI
get.description: For a given LEI, you can retrieve the BIC of that LEI.

parameters.name: lei
parameters.description: LEI (20-characters) for which the corresponding BIC is requested

400.description: Wrong URL format or Invalid request

401.description: You do not have sufficient privileges to execute this service

404.description: No corresponding BIC found or Wrong URL format

get.summary: Get National IDs for a BIC
get.description: For a given BIC, you can retrieve the National IDs of that BIC.

parameters.name: bic
parameters.description: BIC (8-characters or 11-characters) for which the corresponding national IDs are requested

400.description: Wrong URL format or Invalid request

401.description: You do not have sufficient privileges to execute this service

404.description: No corresponding national ID found or BIC not found or Wrong URL format

get.summary: Validate SEPA reachability of a BIC
get.description: For a given BIC and SEPA payment scheme, you can validate that it can be reached for SEPA payments and return the SEPA channel CSM (Clearing and Settlement System) through which the bank owning the BIC can be reached; the response also returns the adherence BIC that signed the adherence agreement with the EPC and the intermediary institution's BIC (if applicable and available)

parameters.name: bic
parameters.description: BIC (8-characters or 11-characters) for which SEPA reachability is requested

parameters.name: sepa_scheme
parameters.description: SEPA service code

200.description: Payment channel(s) found with the supplied BIC and scheme

400.description: Invalid SEPA scheme parameter or Wrong URL format or Invalid request

401.description: You do not have sufficient privileges to execute this service

404.description: No payment channel found with the supplied BIC and scheme or Wrong URL format

get.description: For a given BIC, you can retrieve the Standing Settlement Instructions (SSIs) for that BIC, for a given currency, and (optionally) an SSI category (wholesale or retail).

parameters.name: bic
parameters.description: BIC (8-characters or 11-characters) for which the corresponding SSIs are requested

parameters.name: currency_code
parameters.description: A 3-character currency code for which SSI data needs to be retrieved

parameters.name: ssi_category
parameters.description: Code that indicates the SSI category for which SSI data needs to be retrieved, that is COPA or WHLS

200.description: SSI(s) found with the supplied parameters

400.description: Invalid currency parameter or Invalid SSI category parameter or Wrong URL format or Invalid request

401.description: You do not have sufficient privileges to execute this service

404.description: No SSI matching the supplied parameters or Wrong URL format

get.summary: Get details of a National ID
get.description: For a given National ID, you can retrieve the details of that National ID, that is the bank name or business name, and the address. You must provide either a country code, or an indication to which scheme the National ID belongs.

parameters.name: national_id
parameters.description: National ID for which details are requested

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The 2-character ISO 3166-1 country code of the country that issued the National ID (mandatory, when scheme parameter is not provided)

parameters.name: scheme
parameters.description: The scheme under which the national ID is defined (mandatory, when country_code parameter is not provided)

400.description: Invalid scheme parameter or Invalid country code parameter or Invalid parameters or Wrong URL format or Invalid request

401.description: You do not have sufficient privileges to execute this service

404.description: No corresponding National ID found or Wrong URL format

get.summary: Check the Validity of a National ID
get.description: With this API call, you can check whether a national ID is correct and valid; you need to provide the national ID, and either a country code, or an indication to which scheme this national ID belongs

parameters.name: national_id
parameters.description: National ID to validate

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The 2-character ISO 3166-1 country code of the country that issued the National ID (mandatory, when scheme parameter is not provided)

parameters.name: scheme
parameters.description: The scheme under which the national ID is defined (mandatory, when country_code parameter is not provided)

400.description: Invalid scheme parameter or Invalid country code parameter or Invalid parameters or Wrong URL format or Invalid request

401.description: You do not have sufficient privileges to execute this service

404.description: The national ID format is valid but it does not exist or Wrong URL format

get.summary: Get BICs of a National ID
get.description: For a given national ID, you can retrieve the BIC or the BICs of that national ID; you need to provide the national ID, and either a country code, or an indication to which scheme this national ID belongs

parameters.name: national_id
parameters.description: National ID for which the corresponding BICs are requested

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The 2-character ISO 3166-1 country code of the country that issued the National ID (mandatory, when scheme parameter is not provided)

parameters.name: scheme
parameters.description: The scheme under which the national ID is defined (mandatory, when country_code parameter is not provided)

400.description: Invalid scheme parameter or Invalid country code parameter or Invalid parameters or Wrong URL format or Invalid request

401.description: You do not have sufficient privileges to execute this service

404.description: No corresponding BIC found or Wrong URL format

validity.description: The code IVAL if the IBAN is valid

status.developer_message: The IBAN checksum is different from the calculated checksum using the ISO 3166 standard and the MOD97-10 algorithm

bic.description: The BIC associated with the IBAN

country_code.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code of the country of the institution/branch.

checksum.description: The checksum extracted from the IBAN

bank_id.description: The BANK ID extracted from the IBAN. Its structure (bank ID only or bank ID + branch ID) is as defined by the IBAN BIC LENGTH in the IBANSTRUCTURE file.

branch_id.description: Unique and unambiguous identification of a branch of a financial institution.

account_number.description: The remainder of the IBAN including the account number.

lei.description: The corresponding LEI for a given BIC

bic.description: The BIC of the institution on which more information is requested

institution_name.description: Name by which a party is known and which is usually used to identify that party

branch_information.description: A free text description of the branch as provided by the financial institution to which it belongs; this is currently provided for entries with a BIC when the financial institution concerned wants to provide this extra information

contact_details.description: Information about how the party can be contacted

office_type.description: Status of the entity in the office hierarchy

swift_services.description: A list of 3-character codes and names of SWIFT FIN service codes (also called value added service codes)

validity.description: The code VBIC if the BIC is valid

effective_date.description: A date in YYYY-MM-DD format to indicate explicitly on which date the BIC is confirmed to be valid; the timezone is always UTC, hence the 'Z' suffix will always be present, in compliance with ISO 8601 / RFC 3339

address_lines.description: An array of maximum 4 lines (strings) expressing the street address of the BIC, e.g. street name, house number, building name and floor, area

post_office_box.description: Numbered box in a post office, assigned to a person or organisation, where letters are kept until called for

town_name.description: Name of a built-up area, with defined boundaries, and a local government

country_subdivision.description: Identifies a subdivision of a country (for example, state, region, county)

post_code.description: Identifier consisting of a group of letters and/or numbers that is added to a postal address to assist the sorting of mail

country_name.description: The country name in English of the institution/branch as indicated in the ISO 3166 list

country_code.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code of the country of the institution/branch

phone_number.description: Collection of information that identifies a phone number, as defined by telecom services

fax_number.description: Collection of information that identifies a FAX number, as defined by telecom services

web_address.description: Address for the Universal Resource Locator (URL), that is used over the www (HTTP) service

code.description: Code given by the service provider (SWIFT) to uniquely identify a service it offers

name.description: Name given by the service provider (SWIFT) to uniquely identify a service it offers

payment_channels.description: SEPA CSM through which the BIC is reachable for the supplied SEPA scheme

adherence_bic.description: Adherence BIC11 of the reachable BIC

id.description: The id of the payment channel (SEPA-compliant CSM)

member_type.description: A payment channel has a member_type, the member_type has one of the codes DRCT, IDRC or UKWN

direct_participant.description: The BIC of the direct participant through which the indirectly reachable BIC can be reached; it may only be present if the payment channel's member is an indirect participant

national_ids.institution_name: BANA BANK IN BELGIUM, LA HULPE

id.description: National ID for which details were requested

scheme.description: The scheme under which the national ID is defined

institution_name.description: Name by which a party is known and which is usually used to identify that party

branch_information.description: A free text description of the branch as provided by the financial institution to which it belongs; this is currently provided for entries with a BIC when the financial institution concerned wants to provide this extra information

contact_details.description: Information about how the party can be contacted

office_type.description: Status of the entity in the office hierarchy

id.description: The National ID of the institution or branch

type.description: The type of national ID; if absent, it is the main national ID (MA), otherwise it is Foreign National ID (FN) or Alternative National ID (AN)

scheme.description: The scheme under which the national ID is defined

ssis.institution_name: BANA BANK IN BELGIUM, LA HUKPE

owner_bic.description: The owner of the SSI Nostro Account

institution_name.description: Name by which an institution is known and which is usually used to identify that institution

branch_information.description: A free text description of the branch as provided by the financial institution to which it belongs; for the time being this will be provided only for entries with a BIC and only when the financial institution concerned wants to provide this extra information; the information is sourced from the BIC Directory

address.description: Address of the owner of the SSI

currency_code.description: The ISO 4217 currency code of the requested SSIs

direct.description: Indicates whether there is a direct account relationship between the owner of the SSI and the correspondent; if false, then this means at least the first intermediary must be present

correspondent.description: The counterparty where the owner BIC is holding the SSI for the specified currency

first_intermediary.description: Contains the BIC and the Nostro account of the first intermediary with the correspondent; the first intermediary is the owner of the account with the correspondent

second_intermediary.description: Contains the BIC and the Nostro account of the second intermediary with the first intermediary; the second intermediary is the owner of the account with the first intermediary

account.description: The account for a given BIC

preferred.description: Indicates if it is a preferred correspondent, true (yes) or false (no)

account.description: The account for a given BIC

national_id.description: The national ID that was validated

scheme.description: The scheme under which the national ID is defined

validity.description: Contains the code VNID (Valid National ID) if the National ID is valid in the provided scheme or country

bics.description: An array of the corresponding BICs

http.description: A repeat of the HTTP status code

code.description: An error code or status code, unique across all SWIFT APIs

user_message.description: Provided in case your application needs to display a short error message to a human end-user

developer_message.description: A verbose description for a developer of the possible causes of the error and the possible fixes

more_info.description: A hyperlink to an explanation of the error for developers, possibly with further pointers to community input
